verbs.description: resurrectionize (third-person singular simple present resurrectionizes, present participle resurrectionizing, simple past and past participle resurrectionized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To resurrect, or raise from the dead.
examples: you will stare at the catalogue of dead authors whom I shall have to resurrectionise

entries.meaning: To remove a body from its grave (illegally, for dissection); to engage in bodysnatching.
examples: "Remember, the law now punishes with transportation those who resurrectionize, and those who encourage resurrectionists."
